API / Views / URLs

Lists all available URL routes in the OC Lettings application and their purpose.

Main Project URLs

1path('', views.index, name='index'),
2path('lettings/', include('lettings.urls')),
3path('profiles/', include('profiles.urls')),
4path('admin/', admin.site.urls),

Lettings Application

1path('', views.index, name='index'),
2path('<int:letting_id>/', views.letting, name='letting'),

Profiles Application

1path('', views.index, name='index'),
2path('<str:username>/', views.profile, name='profile'),

Available Endpoints

Main Pages

  • / - Home page

  • /admin/ - Django admin interface

Lettings

  • /lettings/ - List all available lettings

  • /lettings/<id>/ - Show specific letting details

Profiles

  • /profiles/ - List all user profiles

  • /profiles/<username>/ - Show specific user profile details
